long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PunyCodeChecker protects users from Homograph Attack. It will prompt a warning page when the visited domain name contains non-ASCII characters. Users can clear the exempted URLs by clicking on the plugin icon. It has a safe browsing button redirecting to bing.
